notes: One of the oldest rare-spawning bosses. Also known as the [[Stone Golem]]'s boss, although Grorlam has never been found in the vicinity of any nor does summon them.
name: Grorlam
location: Deep in [[Mount Sternum Undead Cave|Mount Sternum/Undead Cave]], in an {{Mapper Coords|126.124|125.66|12|2|text=empty cave}} that is located under some [[Cave Rat]]s (can also be reached through [[Ancient Temple]]), in the {{Mapper Coords|126.163|125.0|15|2|text=cave}} down after the [[Giant Spider]], in the [[Dragon]]'s spawn, in an unreachable 2 sqm area with some tombs at the undead area, and possibly other places under [[Mount Sternum]]. A [[Pick]] is needed to enter these caves. He might also spawn on fourth and fifth floor of the undead cave.
strategy: Since the [[Updates/8.1|Christmas Update 2007]], Grorlam can see [[invisible]] players and is stronger against physical attacks. Death damage, fire and possible ice damage do well against it.
